meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in the process of printing or typing.
meanings.sent1: The typographical errors in the document made it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: The book had a beautiful typographical layout with clear fonts and spacing.
meanings.sent3: The typographical mishaps in the newspaper article caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her typographical skills were like a well-orchestrated symphony on the page.
meanings.sent5: The typographical precision of the brochure left a lasting impression on the readers.

meanings.sent1: The typographical design of the website was modern and appealing.
meanings.sent2: She admired the typographical choices in the magazine layout.
meanings.sent3: The typographical nuances in the logo design were subtle yet effective.
meanings.sent4: His typographical expertise transformed the plain text into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The typographical finesse of the poster caught everyone's eye at the event.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the arrangement of type.
meanings.sent1: The typographical arrangement of the menu made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent2: He studied the typographical elements of the book cover to understand its appeal.
meanings.sent3: The typographical puzzle on the billboard intrigued passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her typographical choices added depth and character to the project.
meanings.sent5: The typographical harmony in the brochure reflected the designer's attention to detail.
